name: vcglr_gaming_venues_2015_2017
title: Gaming Venues Liquor Expenditure (VCGLR) 2015 - 2017
abstract: Gaming venue information for 513 gaming venues across Victoria (total number varies). This includes expenditure by half years and full financial years for 2015, 2016 and the first half of 2017 (to February only). Note, the location of each venue is approximate only and may not reflect its actual location. Each row has also been joined to its liquor licensing information (where available and applicable). As venue details may change over time, please also verify the venue's location and name. For more information visit https://www.vcglr.vic.gov.au/

selectedAttributes.name: egm_no_e_1
selectedAttributes.title: Number of Electronic Gaming Machines as at 30 Jun 2017
